description.narrative: Ministry of Education at central and decentralized levels has strengthened capacities for policy development, coordination, planning, budgeting and monitoring, including in humanitarian situation, which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, children of basic and post-basic school age, especially girls, have increased and more equitable access to quality learning in a progressively strengthened education system, including in humanitarian situations

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Ministry of Education at central and decentralized levels has strengthened capacities for policy development, coordination, planning, budgeting and monitoring, including in humanitarian situation

description.narrative: For the first time in Iraq, a National Learning Assessment (NLA) of students in Mathematics and Science was conducted. Results of the assessment and an analytical report will be available in December 2019. This was a significant achievement since no systematic assessments have never been conducted. e. A total of 19.625 learners participated in the survey across the country. Similarly, there was progress in eleven governorates to conduct decentralized sector analysis and development of costed sector plans. At national level, UNICEF, UNESCO and World Bank responded to governments request to support the development of the National Education Strategy (NES). | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/12/2018

title.narrative: System Strengthening - EMIS - National EMIS provides quality and timely data - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a national/system-level large scale assessment, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance
